name: Prototype Light
description:
Prototype Light is a rhythm platformer game.

You play as a test subject who has accepted the challenge of traversing time and space. After completing initial testing you get thrown in an unknown period in time and must now find your away back home, collecting light and nuclear energy to power your suit up. You encounter many different obstacles which are linked with time and space, through the use of music and sound.

Currently there are 2 playable levels. 

First level is a semi-tutorial level set in the scientist's lab. Here you get a taste of the hurdles to come and how to overcome them.

Second level is the core of the game where you have to complete multiple platforming obstacles. This level is set in the techno ruins in a jungle, the remains of the former lab. 

The controls are simple W/S/A/D or arrows, SPACE to jump and E to interact.

Credits:

Art & Visuals: Adrian Gabrysz & Alexandra Panduru 

Design & Porgramming: Marian Dumitriu.

See the official website made by Adrian: - https://adriangabrysz0508.wixsite.com/prototypelight
